name: Son cubano
description: Cuban style popular from the 1920s to the 1950s that combines the structure of Spanish song-oriented styles with African rhythms and percussion.

children.name: Bolero son
children.description: Blend of Bolero and Son cubano that appeared during the 1920s.

children.name: Bolero son
children.description: Blend of Bolero and Son cubano that appeared during the 1920s.

children.name: Son montuno
children.description: Developed in the 1940s, characterized by more elaborate instrumental arrangements and larger ensembles typically adding a horn section, conga drums, and piano.
